data.name: Undying Demo
data.detailed_description:
You've been infected by a zombie bite, your time is running out but your son must live on! In this demo, take control of Anling the mother of Cody and experience the first 4 days of Undying. Gather, craft and fight in this zombie infested world while also teaching your son his own set of survival skills. Is there enough time to teach your son everything? How does the infection affect your humanity? Is there somewhere safe?

Get a taste early by playing the Undying Demo for the Steam Game Festival, Summer Edition!


Infected by a zombie bite, Anling's days are numbered. She must now fight to survive, not for herself but her young son, Cody. Ensure Cody's survival in a zombie infested world by protecting him and teaching him valuable skills, at any cost.

In this emotional survival game take control of Anling whose goal is to make sure her son Cody is safe and can live on after she turns. Limited resources must be managed in order to slow down Anling’s infection while also making sure both Anling and Cody do not starve from hunger or thirst.

Anling must also teach her son essential survival skills such as cooking, crafting and combat before hers begin to fade. She might find that in certain situations she will start depending on him.

A perfect balance of managing your days looking for resources and increasing Cody’s skill set will be needed in order to survive the long journey

LIKE MOTHER, LIKE SON

Cody will learn from the actions his mother, from combat to cooking. Make sure he knows the basics of survival before it is too late.

WHEN LIFE GIVES YOU METAL PARTS…

Always be on the lookout for materials. You never know what is valuable to a trader, or what useful item you might be able to craft.

TICKING TIME BOMB

Anling’s infection is ever looming. Manage your days and make the most of the time you have left. You will need to keep pushing on, because time doesn’t wait for you.

A WORLD FROM MEMORY

Build a world map unique to your playthrough through memory. Strategically place key locations on the world map as Anling “remembers” where they are.

CHERISH THE MOMENT

Do not lose sight of what you are fighting for. Enjoy the small moments...

GAME FEATURES

  • Top down survival game with real-time day/night cycle.
  • Player generated world map
  • Rogue-like replayability
  • Beautiful low poly art-style
  • Dozens of NPCs to interact with
  • Emotional story about survival and letting go
  • Watch your son grow as your AI partner learns from you
  • Incredible soundtrack


UNDYING has a growing and very enthusiastic community. We love to hear your thoughts and desires for the game and just chat with you. Join the Official UNDYING Discord server to get in on the ground floor as we build the game and leave your mark on the final product! Join our Discord here: https://discord.gg/playundying


Make sure to add UNDYING to your Wishlist to be one of the first to experience this emotional tale when the game launches.

data.short_description: Gather, craft and fight in this zombie infested world while also teaching your son his own set of survival skills. Is there enough time to teach your son everything? How does the infection affect your humanity? Is there somewhere safe? Play the Undying Demo for the Steam Game Festival!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® i3-3220, AMD FX 6300 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 650 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 960 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages.
